Name: Honey Daiquiri
Ingredients: 60 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
20 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Rich flavoursome honey replaces sugar syrup in this natural Daiquiri. Try experimenting with different kinds of honey. We favour orange blossom honey.
Nutrition: One serving of Honey Daiquiri contains 181 calories
